name: Tex-Mex Layer Pizza
description: Leftovers make a perfect lunch the next day.
preparation: Sauté pepper in oil in frying pan over medium heat. Stir in 3 Onion Dip Mix, corn, Salsa, Taco Seasoning and Minced Garlic, heating thoroughly. Remove from heat and set aside.
In a separate bowl, combine sour cream, ricotta, mozzarella and cream cheese. Set aside.

Place 1 tortilla in the bottom of a spring form pan or on Epicure’s parchment-lined Sheet Pan. Layer with a third of the vegetable mixture, cheese mixture and beans. Top with another tortilla and repeat.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chillies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavour with medium heat.

products.name: Minced Garlic
summary: Full, bold, garlic flavour. No chopping required.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
